originalText.text: Other than my family I usually don‚Äôt trust nobody but for 3 years my daughter have been apart of the Growing Happy Group Family Daycare and I realized there are many people you can build trust with and it can be successful. ‚ÄùIt takes a village to raise a child‚Äù and this daycare is a village who take care of the children that is in their care. I haven‚Äôt had any issues and my daughter have been safe, sound and nurtured by excellent and experienced staff. Both locations is well sanitized, they have cameras, they provide meals, play time, and educational activities and exercises, your children will make many friends and this daycare offers transportation for the children who is attending. Originally I wasn‚Äôt opened to putting my daughter in a daycare setting but I‚Äôm so happy I did and with my choice of the provider; I know I‚Äôve made the right decision. My daughter is on her way to greatness thanks to Growing Happy Group Family Day Care, I will stay in touch even after my daughter relocates and I would most definitely recommend this daycare to anyone who needs a safe space for their children. I hope my comment is useful to everyone looking for a daycare. Have a blessed day to all.

originalText.text:
Growing happy is a wonderful daycare, by far the most loyal, safe, happy daycare I ever met. ‚ù§Ô∏èThese people are not just regular daycare providers they are FAMILY!! The love Ms. Gonzalez gives out is beyond amazing and she is a loving person the way she looks out for SINGLE MOTHERS!! My experience with growing happy still continues into my second child going here and let‚Äôs just say my kids love it here and so I don‚Äôt have no complaints and is the best  daycare I have ever came across.
‚Ä¶..What Ms.Gonzalez most important goal is to look out for SINGLE MOTHERS and the way she works with them just so your child/ children can have a daycare while single mothers try to achieve a job or go back to school etc. Ms.Gonzalez Looks out for these children like they‚Äôre her own. Makes them three meals a day accommodate
to your child needs , having little holidays party, trips , etc.If your looking for a daycare I will recommend growing happy.

originalText.text: This place is amazing. So grateful to have my son attend growing up happy. I love the staff and how they care for my son. It‚Äôs clean organized. Thank you to the director and owner Salome. She helped me when I was in need. I highly recommend Growing Happy Day Care ‚ù§Ô∏è

originalText.text: Hi growing happy is a great daycare. All three of my children have attended this daycare since my 16 year old daughter was 7 years old, and my autistic son was 5 years old. They both have aged out. My 5 year old daughter started attending growing happy since she was 6 weeks old, my daughter still attend after school. I recommend parents to enroll your child. Five starsüòÄ

originalText.text: My kids went here at 1 and 3 months old. Loved it they are always on top of things. Communication is absolutely great.  Daily schedules are playful and educational. Your kid would love it!
